result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Dennis Patrick Ledin

defendant.name: Ledin, Dennis Patrick
defendant.address: 107 S Knowles Ave Apt 211, New Richmond, WI 54017

records.addlTxt: Filed by ADA Ballo. arc

11:02 AM CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Fox, Defendant Dennis Patrick Ledin in court.  Attorney Barry Curtis Lundeen in court for Dennis Patrick Ledin.  Attorney Bela Alexander Ballo in court for State of Wisconsin. Court advises of rights and possible penalties regarding a preliminary hearing.  Court finds DF has freely, voluntarily, and knowingly waived the right to a preliminary hearing, finds probable cause that a felony was committed and the DF probably committed that felony and binds over for trial. ADA Ballo states Ct 2 to be amended to misd. poss of THC. The State to file an INFO. Atty Lundeen is prepared to go to ARGN. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Def pleads NOT GUILTY to all charges. Court confirms address. Pre-trial/scheduling conference scheduled for January 5, 2023 at 09:30 am.
Pre-trial/scheduling conference on January 5, 2023 at 09:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on October 25, 2022 at 11:00 am.

1:39 PM CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: K. Anderson, Attorney Bela Alexander Ballo in court for State of Wisconsin, Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court,Defendant Dennis Patrick Ledin in court. DE does not qualify for public defender, PFAC provided. DE received copy of complaint, confirms address and DOB. Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands. Court finds good cause to extend time limits for preliminary hearing. Court sets bond. Court sets STC for attorney status. Adjourned: 1:43 PM. kma
